name: Rogue Zombie
description:
Rogue Zombie A roguelike zombie game. Plays both as a roguelike and as a FPS.

Made for #7DRL

Note: For this game, I used my own javascript webgl engine that I previously worked on. The engine is still in progress. I updated and used the engine's code for this jam.

Controls: ASWD or QSDZ - move SPACE - shoot gun

Each move / gunshot takes one action, which lets the zombies move one spot. 

Originally, I was hoping to make a roguelike space adventure, but I think I'll reserve that idea for https://itch.io/jam/persistent-roguelike-jam.

This jam was an opportunity to test the usability of my game engine. My conclusion from that was, there's still lot of work to be done!
